description:
After waking up from a catnap on New Years` Day, Nuku Nuku finds the Natsume house empty and panics, assuming they`ve abandoned her forever. She goes out, visits her classmates` houses, and destroys another Mishima robot. But will her beloved family be able to clear up the misunderstanding?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Abandoned? Happy New Year, I`ve been thrown out
ヌクヌク放浪!? あけまして捨てられました
